Resource.name: DeductionTaxSubGroupsService
Resource.Summary: This API enables you to invoke the interfaces defined on 'DeductionTaxSubGroupsService'.

Function.Description: Invoke the method 'GetDeductionTaxSubGroupList' on this service.

DataTypes.Description: The 'DataTypes' defines the types referenced by the 'Functions'. It is only for QA, not for info dev.
